statements.impact_statement: This RCE vulnerability affects our quote-service API which is internet-facing and handles PII/PHI data. Immediate patching required.
statements.action_statement: Upgrade to pg@8.11.3 or later. Deploy emergency patch within 24 hours per KEV directive.

statements.impact_statement: Authentication bypass vulnerability in Express.js. Investigating if our middleware configuration is affected. WAF rules provide partial mitigation.
statements.action_statement: Complete investigation by 2024-10-30. If affected, upgrade to express@4.19.2 immediately.

statements.impact_statement: Prototype pollution vulnerability in lodash. Used in quote calculation logic. Potential for RCE or DoS.
statements.action_statement: Upgrade to lodash@4.17.21. Schedule deployment for 2024-10-30.

statements.impact_statement: SSRF vulnerability in axios. Our usage of axios is limited to external API calls with hardcoded URLs. User input does not control URL parameters.
statements.action_statement: Monitor for changes in usage patterns. Consider upgrading during next maintenance window.

statements.impact_statement: JWT signature verification bypass. Critical for authentication service. Compensating control: Additional signature validation in auth middleware.
statements.action_statement: Upgrade to jsonwebtoken@9.0.3. Deploy within 48 hours.

statements.impact_statement: DoS vulnerability in Redis client. Used for session storage. Could impact availability during attack.
statements.action_statement: Upgrade to redis@4.6.11. Schedule deployment for 2024-10-31.

statements.impact_statement: CSP bypass vulnerability. Our CSP configuration uses strict nonce-based policy which is not affected by this bypass.
DoS vulnerability in OpenSSL. Affects all TLS connections. Could impact availability.
statements.action_statement: Rebuild container images with openssl@3.1.5. Deploy within 72 hours.

statements.impact_statement: HTTP/2 Rapid Reset vulnerability. Previously affected. Patched in production deployment on 2024-10-20.
statements.action_statement: Verified fix deployed. Continue monitoring for regression.

statements.impact_statement: Local DoS in Alpine package manager. Container images are immutable and package manager is not used at runtime.
statements.action_statement: Update base image during next rebuild cycle. Low priority.
